topic.title: LAPAROTOMY FOR NECROTISING ENTEROCOLITIS INDICATION CODE
topic.shortdesc: For the National Neonatal Data Set - Episodic and Daily Care, LAPAROTOMY FOR NECROTISING ENTEROCOLITIS INDICATION CODE is reported when the PATIENT requires a laparotomy based on the result of an Abdominal X-Ray.
